content.detailedDescription: It was on february 26 in hawaii on the island of oahu 2016,  kailua i went outside to take the trash out between 9:30 pm & 10:00 pm it was kinda cloudy and clear when i opened the door i noticed a huge cloud with a rectangular shape violet blue light pulsating along with flashing orbs of bluish purple lights and one bright white light above all the bluish purple flashing lights that didn't blink or flash these lights would randomly blink and pulsate almost as if it was like a building in the sky it lasted about 3minutes and i called my mom and brother and we all witnessed this strange event the whole time this took place it was in this huge strange cloud anybody else who had same experience please share thank you  oh yeah and this building of an object was stationary and didn't have any noise??
content.summary: I went outside of my house and saw this rectangular shaped violet blue light pulsating along with flashing orbs of lights

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were talking on the back porch at dusk. stars had just become visible when i noticed a bright white round star-like object to the south. it traversed over head to the north with no sound, at what appeared to be substantial altitude, in an arc covering about 60% of distance horizon due south to horizon due north.The light did not very in intensity, until the end of my observation when it abrubtly faded out. i am near the northern approach for wright-patt afb and dayton international ap and have never seen any aircraft move with this apparent speed. there were multiple observable vapor trail's in the area at the time and the object produced none, nor did it have any apparent particle or heat trail.
content.summary: Observed solid white non pulsating light at dusk. moved south to north very rapidly, very high, no noise, 30 degrees above horizon south to approximately 45 degrees north in less than 2 seconds, then faded out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was preparing to leave my driveway.  i looked over my shoulder to back up and out of nowhere this orb of light appeared out of nowhere and began to descend toward the tree-line that was north of me. i had no idea of what the object was, i simply was in fear because i had never seen anything quite like it. it psychologically scrambled me because of the scary nature that it had. i watched it as it softly floated to the ground and went into the woods to the north of me, it didn't crash, it seemed that it was able to actually quickly find a way to drop directly into the woods without incident. it impressively and quickly hovered/dropped into the woods. 

i've seen one other unexplained incident of this before, except the light was red, this time it put more fear into me due to the fact that the shed motion sensor lights were triggered and the object was too far away to trigger it, and there was nothing around to set it off. immediately after it was triggered the lights sputtered out on it and went dark, almost as if electromagnetic interference had an effect on the lights. i lost sight of it for good as i waited for around 3 minutes to see if anything bright emerged from the woods. the object masked its light as it fell into the tree-line. as i type this right now i will have a fire arm alongside of me as i sleep, something feels off in the area right now. i plan to further investigate the area in the morning, if i find anything and i am contacted i will be sure to give more detail of my findings. this was arguably the most disturbing thing i've ever seen, the electromagnetic interference and the triggering of the lights from nearly 500-700 feet away was abnormal enough. tomorrow i will check also to see if the lights were fried, because the odd and eerie way that they shut off in a "sputtering" nature was abnormal.
content.summary: Bright blueish whitish orb, eerie looking.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 2 am jan. 3, 2016 and i was just getting to bed when i saw this bright light hovering above the tree line just south. i thought it was a satellite but not that low below the clouds. i got my iphone and started to take a picture from my bedroom window. i then took a video from my patio door to see without window reflection. i took the video for over 2 minutes. what caught my attention was the way it was hovering stationary above the tree and then moving higher in elevation very slowly. 
the reason i wanted to post the video here on mofon was that i just saw a video from a guy in east coast canda. mufon case 57090 in kensington, pei on june 4. it's the same type of sphere like glow and trajectory.
content.summary: Just saw this glowing light pulsating from my bedroom window. it was hovering above the tree line as in picture.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were near the front office of the apartment complex when i commented on what i thought was two hawks flying from nellis afb moving our direction and headed southeast. as the objects got closer i saw a white light reflecting off the objects.  i assumed it was a reflection from the sun, but it could have been something else.  at that moment i ruled out it being hawks.  the objects were about 10,000 to 12,000 feet high.  the highest object was a dark-shaped ball.  another object was flying approximately 200-500 feet below the top object and appeared to be trailing slightly behind the top object.  it was black and appeared to be wing shaped like a hawk would look, but wider, thicker wings.  they appeared to be moving in unison as if they were "working" together.  of note, the wind was blowing opposite of the direction of where they were flying.  we could tell that by the direction the flags were waving in the air.  in fact, the objects appeared to be gliding or hovering.  the sky was partly cloudy but as usual there is usually a "open hole" with no clouds in our area so we got a good look.  both objects stayed together and floated out of sight as they appeared to be headed towards the direction of henderson, nv.

i have seen black helicopters flying the same general direction.  this may or may not have any relation to the event.

this is my third sighting in the same area of similar objects.  my first two sightings were not placed in the mufon database.  in feb 2014, i saw a black box hovering as a black lady asked me about a black helicopter showing up in the location just minutes prior.  it hovered about 15,000 feet directly under a commercial flight path and floated out in the direction of henderson, nv.

approximately one month ago the same friend and i observed a double facited diamond-shape black object that was rotating.  as it rotated the sun appeared to reflect off it.  it moved in the direction of henderson.
content.summary: Dark ball-shaped object and dark wing-shaped object flying together

content.detailedDescription:
Since november 2015 i have noticed that entities are showing up in pictures i take of myself. they appear around me and on my exposed skin. my face also transforms. 

i do not know what to do about it or why it is happening. any assistance would be greatly appreciated.

i have submitted 5 photos and they were all taken at different times and dates.
content.summary: When i take photographs of myself entities show up in pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone talking to my mom looking out my backdoor to the east. saw a very bright white light bobbing and zipping around in the sky for about 5 minutes. it then just shot off into space at a very accelerated rate of speed. gave me a creepy feeling.
content.summary: Bright white light bobbing like a top then shot off into space

content.detailedDescription:
When i take pictures of myself entities appear in the photograph approximately 90% of the time. sometimes they appear on my exposed skin and sometimes my face transformed. it has happened to me in connecticut, tucson and glendale, az. i started to notice this in november 2016 and i do not know what to do with this ability or why it is happening. any assistance in helping me to understand this would be greatly appreciated.

i have downloaded 5 pictures and they all happened at different dates and times.
content.summary: My body attracts entities that can be photographed

content.detailedDescription:
Looking in the northern sky, an extremely bright light just appeared, as i watched it got brighter yet.Next thing you know it went what i would call, straight up and was gone in literally a flash. 
i have ben watching this sky forever, i know what an airplane looks and sounds like, in my opinion, this was not what i see every night while outside.
content.summary: Extremely bright light just disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on a one day tour of london in may 2013 and i was simply snapping photos and a few videos of the landmarks.  we were unaware of their presence and did not see any ufo's.  to my knowledge nobody near us saw anything unusual.  when we returned from the trip i loaded the photos in my computer and reviewed them for the first time.  one of the photos was of a passenger plane coming out of the clouds near a high rise building i believe to be called the shard.  i enlarged the photo to get a better view of the plane for a possible enlargement and noticed a bright object between the plane and the building.  it appeared to me to possibly be a ufo so i continued to examine more closely the other photos i took in london and found a few more objects.  there were some larger clouds that appear to have unusual well formed shapes that i cannot say are ufo's.  i did accidently shoot a video of the tower bridge with an object moving in the sky above it.  again, i did not see it at the time.  i attached some of the photos below and am not sure if i have some others as well.
content.summary: Did not see it until reviewing photos on home computer.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Me encontraba fumando en la vereda de mi casa recostado por el coche, mirando el cielo prã¡cticamente sin nubes, cuando empece a ver una luz titilante como un globo que recorrã­a el cielo, me concentre y sorprendã­ ya que su vuelo erra errã¡tico, no coincidã­a con la pequeã±a brisa que habã­a ese dã­a a pleno sol pasado el medio dã­a.
llame a mis familiares que estaban dentro de la casa para que me pasaran el celular, sin quitarle la vista al objeto, que se desplazaba perdiã©ndose. 
cuando mi esposa me dice allã­ hay otro, hacia el sur-este, y se comenzã³ a alejar, allã­ comencã© a grabar, cuando me dice hay otro mas allã¡ que viene, al que lo seguã­ con la grabaciã³n.
se perdã­a hacia el sur-oeste y deje de grabar.
pasado unos dã­as me puse a revisar la grabaciã³n, en primera instancia parecã­a un objeto de vuelo anormal, al cual no di mucha importancia.
grabe 3 vã­deos de varios minutos cada uno, en el segundo me llama la atenciã³n un destello rã¡pido cerca del objeto que grabe, que no habã­a visto ese dã­a en el cielo, si en la grabaciã³n.
decidã­ descargarlos en  mi computadora y descargar un programa para ver la grabaciã³n fotograma por fotograma.
allã­ descubrã­ que habã­an muchos objetos cruzando al que grababa a gran velocidad en distintas direcciones y cambiando bruscamente de direcciã³n.
sorpresa inmensa ya que en la reproducciã³n a velocidad normal es imperceptible, viendo cuadro por cuadro, es asombroso los objetos que hay, mas de 8 llegue a contar.
no poseo un software y computadora mas potente para hacer una mejor revisiã³n. en el primer vã­deo, en una parte de la grabaciã³n, solamente en dos fotogramas aparece un objeto rã¡pidamente, bien definida, a una altura bastante baja, muy denotable su contorno con un ovni.
no es mi primer avistamiento. este es el tercero y que pude grabarlo.
mi primer avistamiento fue de noche, un objeto luminoso estacionario, luego se desplazo a hipervelocidad, se detuvo, se transformo en dos objetos, y salieron a hipervelocidad alejã¡ndose y se definã­a su forma de plato.
mi segundo avistamiento tambiã©n fue de dã­a, una esfera color cromo-plata con vuelo muy lento, a baja altura, siguiendo la trayectoria del rã­o.
les envã­o algunas imã¡genes de fotogramas capturados del vã­deo original que poseo.
espero contactarnos. enviã© a jaime mausan de el programa tercer milenio, hace diez dã­as, pero aun no me responde.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Observando al cielo veo luces, procedã­ a grabar con el celular a los minutos, al 3er. objeto

content.detailedDescription: I was heading west on highway 299 on the stretch of road between  douglas city and steelbridge road.I was heading home from a relatives house,it was my mother,my brother and i in the car,i was up front while my mother drove.We had just passed the turn near indian creek lodge when there was an orange,bright,lightning like flash in the sky.Both me and my mother were startled and when we looked up there was an orange org hovering and pulsating over a mountain ridge.We pulled over so we could get a proper look at it,after roughly a minute it flashed an orange light,and seemed to zip up into the stars.
content.summary: In a flash a glowing orange u.F.O. appeared,hovered for a minute,then blasted upwards.

content.detailedDescription:
on thanksgiving day 2013 my mother in law was on the front porch and called me out to look at some strange lights. i got out there and saw what looked to be a bright orange light. brighter than sirius. i watched it for about 3 or 4 seconds and thought its color was weird so i went and grabbed a cheap kodak camera. well my cheap kodak camera took some cheap kodak video. i took 2 different short videos 15 seconds long. 
    while looking west i saw one object with 4 or 5 lights changing color, brightness, and blinking. skies were clear and object was heading straight at us guessing under 5000'. when it got at about 45 degrees it disappeared, or just went dark. nothing was seen in or around it for the ten minutes i was there waiting to make sure a plane didn't turn around or go through a cloud i didn't see. i don't know what it was but it didn't look like plane lights which we see every day. 
    its not a good video and the only thing i can say is it looked weird and then when it was closest it went dark and was gone. as for it looking like airplane lights i've never seen airplane lights change color and i'm pretty sure you cant just turn your lights off ever. i know on video this looks like plane lights. all i can say is i don't believe it was. honestly was hoping to give this video to someone who can look at the light spectrum analysis to see if this is a known light source out of curiosity. 
and i did go buy a better camera
       thanks for your time,shannon dennis
content.summary: On thanksgiving day at about 9pm my mother in law was on front porch and called me out to see strange lights

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside like i always do before bed and looked around just observing the sky when i noticed 3 pulsating lights. 2 were off to the right of the third. they were pulsating random colors very quickly. after an hour they all joined together. i had an overwhelming sense of peace. i went inside to get some tea and when i came back out they were gone. i have never seen anything like that in my 45 years.
content.summary: 3 pulsating lights that all came together and made one

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone at mufon hq by field investigator l. flechtner on march 8th, 2016   for information only
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


in 1952 my father and i were cutting down a tree and i looked up and saw this hovering saucer  coming towards us. it made a humming noise but had no lights. it was about 75 yards from us, i could have hit it with a gun, and about 75 feet from us. it came slowly towards us and hovered over us for about 5 minutes. it had round dark colored windows, about 2 feet in size,  going around the side and was an aluminum color. no lights. it had a dome on top like an upside down cup, and it came almost to the edge of the saucer. the bottom had a 4 foot fan/blade like a spinning wheel, spinning on the bottom. it was going really fast. my mom saw it too. we watched it and it hovered over us, then it shot straight up and went out of sight. it left a pure white corkscrew trail as it lifted off. the trail stayed a long time until the breeze dissipated it. we wanted to call portland but thought no one would believe us.
i'm in my eighties now and wanted to tell my story. you can call me with any questions.
content.summary: In 1952 my father and i were cutting down a tree and i looked up and saw this hovering saucer

content.detailedDescription:
I was in bed awake every night and could not sleep because of neighbors' loud sounds. i stared at a water tower located on fuller and leonard ne, grand rapids, mi. the object came at an extremely fast rate of speed. it was an eight foot capsule and it stopped in front of my neighbor's window 20 feet of away. it then turned to view my third floor window. it stayed for 4-5 mins. i stared at every detail on the capsule and saw three black aliens. i can remember every detail of the capsule and aliens. after 5 mins it then turned and took the same path back to the water tower. 

i had seen them two nights before in the early evening. there had been a storm, and i saw them over a school yard. the capsule had come out of a small, gray cloud with pink on the bottom. they appeared for about 3 minutes. there was light blue in the middle of capsule. 

i saw them again on september 1st at noon, looking to the n.E. sky. they did two circles around a huge white sky. this time the ship was flat and thin and they were much higher in the sky by the planes.

the last time i saw them was june 6 of 2015. i saw them at 2 am in the morning and they were as high as jets in the sky. at this time they were white in the inside. but the ship was still capsule in shape.

i felt terrified during the times i saw them, and i didn't know who to call or who to talk to about the event. it also happened so quickly that i was unable to get other evidence. but i am willing to take a lie detector test.
content.summary: 8ft capsule with 3 black aliens

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting at night on the balcony of our rented villa in the mountains just outside nerja i was looking at the stars on the horizon just a little higher that eye level and noticed two bright "stars" that looked odd and out off place, both were level with each other ie like these two dots  .  . they then swapped direction in the blink of an eye to being vertical : the bottom light went into the horizon (sea)?And the other flew straight over our head. 6 adults and 5 kids all saw the same thing and cannot explain what we saw
content.summary: 2 lights in the sky changed direction then flew away

content.detailedDescription:
I live on parkhurst drive near its intersection with northcliff drive in northeast dallas, texas. i was outside in my back yard at 10:15 pm cst, on saturday march 5, 2016. to my southeast i saw a moving bright red light that was flying level at about 3,000-ft altitude and at about 1-mile horizontal distance from me. it was flying northeast, from my right to my left, along a path roughly estimated to follow garland road from casa linda plaza to whiterock marketplace shopping center, where it then turned northward toward lochwood park (google map). 

at first, i thought it was a small airplane in straight level flight without much variation. its speed was about 200-mph, too fast to be a helicopter. i looked for any other lights, specifically white strobes and green navigation lights, but it only had a steady intense red. since it is illegal to fly below 10,000-feet without white lights, i quickly inferred that it was not an airplane or other human construct. no craft silhouette was visible because of the steady bright red light. then, i purposely listened intently for an airplane sound, but there was only dead silence. the craft then swung around from my southeast to my northeast, apparently making a 45-degree left turn, and headed northwest, keeping 1-mile distance from me. when it was to my northeast, i lost sight of it because of trees. i watched it travel about 1.6-miles total distance and my sighting lasted about 30-seconds. 

i am 76-years of age, take walks every night, and have vast experience viewing aircraft in the night sky. i have witnessed several other anomalous objects over dallas within the past three years, but none before 2013. my conclusion is that this particular craft was a machine that is not man-made, because – 1. the lighting was illegal, 2. there was no sound at all, 3. the large scale ruled out an rc drone, 4. the speed indicated a powerful craft, 5. the time was late for small airplane operations, 6. the flight path was illogical.
content.summary: Red light flying over dallas texas

content.detailedDescription:
Since november of 2016 entities have been drawn to my body and i have been able to photograph them. the dates and times of the photos attached to this form varies. you will see in one of the photos that one entity has appeared twice, on different days.  in the photo of the reflection of my hand, look at the reflection in the mirror and you will see a face of my thumb. in the rest of the photos you will see entities that look like aliens of some sort. 

i am trying to find out why this is happening and what to do with what has been happening. at this point and time i am perplexed about the entire thing. any information you can offer me about what i am experiencing would be greatly appreciated as i do not know whom to reach out to.  

thanks,
content.summary: Enity attached to me

content.detailedDescription:
Hiking in carbon canyon--out taking pictures sunday, march 6th 11am--snapping pictures of clear, beautiful blue sky and puffy very-white clouds after previous night's rain. took 71 pictures. hours later, when sharing pictures, noticed light blue circle, different blue than sky, in 2 pictures. 

upon further review of pictures, a light-blue sphere or circle was able to clearly be seen--with 4 prominent white lights. 

the object was not noticed or seen while i was taking the pictures at time of hike. 

in reviewing pictures that were snapped in quick succession, millisecond rate of frames, the circle appeared to have moved from a cloud to open blue space between clouds--when i look at the pictures taken this is very evident.

images clearly show object--1st picture is object from distance--original photo--second picture is zoom of that picture, 3rd picture clearly shows circle with lights and is isolation and further zoom of object, 4th picture shows sky with no object. object is not seen in pictures taken immediately before and after pictures uploaded.

many pictures taken in this area over years--this is 1st with anything like this in it. the area is also in flight path of planes--commercial and private--going into lax, sna and ontario to a degree. many planes fly over area, one after another constantly. while hiking in same area yesterday, planes coming from south appeared to be flying unusually low and doing circular patterns thru clouds in early evening.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blue sphere with 4 lights

content.detailedDescription: I came home one night and just noticed these lights flashing all over the place and i got camera and it was like flashes of ufos going all over the place in colours-in slow mo u can see weird objects that look like ufos.I noticed later a blue sphere at bottom that i got glimses of as well as what u see and with the full moon-kinda weird.I missed some things but at least i got something.
content.summary: I came home one night and just noticed these lights flashing all over the place and i got camera and it was like flashes of ufos going all over the place in colours-in slow mo u can see weird objects

content.detailedDescription: I worked the 2nd shift and got off work at 1 o'clock. but left work about 1:20. was on my way to hypermarket that was open 24 hrs.To get a couple things. when i noticed something odd hovering at the top of the radio tower. a solid rectangle that would blink every 2 seconds. at that time i was in awe what it could be. it would blink several times before it would take off towards the left up at a 45 degree angle. i saw it blink 2 more times from the original position before it was out of sight. it was really dark that night.  could not tell if anything else was attached to the red blinking rectangular light. i've seen a lot of shows and documentary and never seen anything like i've seen that night.  i was so excited afterwards of what i witnessed. people who know me know i would never make something up.  especially something this wild. has anybody seen, read, or heard anything like i've seen?
content.summary: Seen a solid rectangle blinking red light hovering next to radio tower blinking every 2 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was 16, 39 now. all night i herd a low bass sound. i thought a neighbor was having a party or something. but the bass kept getting more & more intense on the inside till i couldn't handel it & ran to the bathroom & vomited. after that i felt way too light headed & had to lay down. on my back in a dark room i felt weightless, then it seemed i could see through the ceiling,even though i could still see all around me in the room. but i could see the stars & they seemed to be flying by me fast but comfortably. there was a certain star that stuck out from the rest & kept getting bigger & bigger. by the way the bass sound that made me puke has intensified 100 fold. that star got really close & i could see it was a giant cube. i had so many emotions & thoughts, i tried to say something,.. but my throght choked & all i was feeling shot out of my chest in a beam of light to the cube. the bass intensified & the cube rotated to the left then forward, it then shot a beam of light back to me. it basically told me everything about life & all i wanted or needed to know. only time i've ever felt true peace. then it slowly floated away. i floated there in aww, thanking it as it went away,, then i look up to my right,.. there was an entire fleet of gigantic ships, i wasn't fazed or freaked, i just remember saying softly, oh, that's were they are. i don't remember anything after that. but since, i've told this story many times since 1992& there has been many basterd like movies about my wonderful experience. star trek, the borg's & some others. but its sad to to say the first transformers when they speak of the all spark, is the closest they've come. it is really frustrating cause as soon as saw the fleet, i don't remember anything after or what that beam of light made me feel.
content.summary: Duel conscience experience with a giant cube that was alive.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On december 6, 2011 i saw and reported a ufo to mufon that i observed in the effingham county, ga. area. 
tonight, i observed what appeared to be the exact same ufo, in bryan county, ga. 

at  2353 hours, i was outside in my front yard talking to a friend on the telephone. at approximately, 0000 hours, i observed two stationary reddish white lights hovering approximately 30 degrees above the horizon. from where i was standing, they would have been east of my position, in the vicinity of the ogecchee river, probably roughly 2 miles east of highway 17, and 3 miles southwest of king's ferry boat ramp. just best guess estimate, they would have been in the marsh area, and not near the ogeechee river, south of georgetown, but not as far east as the little ogeechee river. the two lights hovered from aproximately, a minute and initially i assume it was two helicopters. 

abrubtly, the two lights, turned into five reddish white lights, all in a straight line, with the first two i saw being the in middle, two new lights to the left of them, and one to the right. these five lights stayed lit approximately, 20-30 seconds, and they were exactly the same type of sighting i observed in december of 2011. the sighting in 2011 was approiximately 30 miles north of were i was tonight. after about 20-30 seconds, the lights went out completely. after approximately another 20-30 seconds, all five lights reappeared. 

upon reappearing, the lights were still in a straight line, however they appeared to be at a 20 degree upward angle, as if the lights were ascending upward towards the southeast. i got the impression that these lights were ascending upward with linear mometum, and that there was velocity behind a mass in which the lights were all attached too. however, upon reflection, the lights hovered at a 20 degree angle and there was no movement that would have led me to believe they were indeed ascending. 

at that time, i quickly got of the phone so i could try to record the lights with my cellphone camera. as, i pulled up the camera on my cellphone, all five lights disappeared. i filmed the area of the sky for a minute hoping i could capture the lights reappearing, however after one minute i stopped recording. 

after i was unable to record the lights, i tried to call the friend who was with me that saw the lights back in 2011. i knew she was working and moreover, would be working in the area of hwy 204 and hwy 17, so she might have been able to look and see if she could see them. 

after about two to three rings without her picking up the phone, the five lights reappeared, however this time they were back in a straighline and were east of the last place in the sky i saw them. if i was holding a ruler out at arms length, the lights were now approximately a foot east of the last place in the sky i saw them. the lights were again, completely horizontal, just as i had first seen them. 

again, i got the impression the lights were moving eastwardly with a mometum, however in reality i never observed any movement. they appeared stationary. it may have been because of the differing locatoin from the last observation that gave me the impression that the lights were moving. however, i am ultimately unsure why i had the definite impression that the lights were moving and not technically stationary as they appeared. 

upon seeing the lights again, i immediately hung up the phone and again attempted to film them with my cellphone. again, as soon as i was able to get the camera up on my phone all five lights disappeared. 

after the last disappearence, the lights never reappeared again. i stayed outside for approximatley 30-40 minutes, without any remarkable being seen, except for some high flying airplanes, that are very common in my area. 

it was a clear night, and visibility was about as good as it gets being this close to savannah. the sky was clear enough that i could easily see jupiter, which was almost direcetly overhead of me at the time, and mars, had not yet come into view to the east of me (in the area of the sighting). additionally, i never heard any noise from any other aircraft during the time prior, during or after the sighting. 

the flight path from fort stewart to hunter army airfield is probably 100 yards east of me, so i am very accustomed to seeing and hearing military helicopters frequently. the last military helicopter i heard the night of the sighting was approximately, 2200-2230 hours. typically, if there is training or if flights are going on post, i will hear many more helicopters through out the night. 

the lights did not look like any flares that i have ever seen being fired from a airplane or helicopter. i don't see how any flares could maintain a perfect horizontal line after being fired,  and i never saw any falling motion from the lights as if they had been ejected from an aircraft. addtionally, i never saw any upward motion as if they were fired from a vessel or from the ground. 

the only plausible way, i could see that these could have been flares, if they were ejected from an extremely fast moving jet, flying low over the marsh. however, if my estimate of them being two miles out was correct, that would mean that based on my position and the horizon the lights would have been approximatley 2667 feet off the ground. i cannot imagine an aircraft traveling 450 knots, 2700 feet off the ground, and only 2 miles from me and me be unable to hear any noise what-so-ever. additionally, with the second set of five lights at an angle, that would be an aircraft would have to have passed right over top of another aircraft traveling the the opposite direction, at a high-rate of speed, at night, less than 3000 feet off the ground. or descending to 3000 feet right behind another aircraft at 450 knots. not to mention, this would mean another after craft traveling less than 3000 feet would have to be right behind those two aircrafts, traveling east for me to have seen the five lights a third time. basically, three or more aircraft dogfighting, in the marshes, in between richmond hill and savannah, below 3000 feet, making absolutely no sound. suddenly, this seems even less plausable.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four to five red/orange lights traveling eastwardly, then abruptly ascending southeastwardly

content.detailedDescription: 930 went out back to have a cigarette when i saw airplane flying overhead i followed it with my eyesight and i noticed what seems to be circle of lights hovering way high above it at first i thought it was another airplane but it didn't move i came back outside later maybe half hour later it was still there i know it's not an airplane because you can see the planes flying at a lower altitude underneath them. didn't move it just shimmered the lights where an oval shape. could make out any shape only the shape of the lights that forms an oval-shaped circle. at that time i went in to get one of my roommates to show her and we stared at it for what was probably close to an hour. she got scared and went inside to sleep i've been here another 2 hours and i'll just still there too far to record on my phone so i can't send you any pictures or video. i never good news site of the lights eventually got tired and i guess i fell asleep. if you can email me with a response to what i might have been looking at how the weather will be a balloon or something i'd like to know its driving me crazy thank you
content.summary: It stood hovering high above the line of planes desending to lax.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my fiancée in her neighbouring streets, a small village on the outskirt of trois-rivières, qc. canada.  it was clear-sky mid-summer in 1956. she introduced me to the neighbours she knew well.  then while she was talking to this elderly couple, possibly in their 70's, i felt as if i had to look up above to the sky.  like compelled to look up as if i had to.  when i did look up, i saw this very large disc, like a very large unpolish car wheel cover or hubcap. i pressed my girlfriend's hand, interrupting her conversation with her friends neighbours, and said:  "hey, look-up... what is that?" as i said those words,she looked up and saw it to and suddenly that thing just entered straight up into the sky at a very great speed, until we just saw as a small dot disappearing away into the skies. we did not know what that thing was.  the day after we learned that other people had also seen this object.  i felt elated to have seen such a thing but not knowing exactly what it was... and still dont know what this object was.  are there any record from 1956 of this event in trois-rivières or its vicinity?  although i do recall reading something about this event in a book some years ago.  i dont know what has become of this book or its title or anything more about it. would you have any record in your files? or other witnesses?
content.summary: Taking a walk. stoping to talk to neighbours, then up above on a clear sky, this large disk, not moving, and suddenly vertically at fast speed enter the skies!

content.detailedDescription: All described above.1 sitting in yard. bright light appeared. i new it was a flying saucer immediately flying very slowly it came over trees and dropped about 5 ft. into yard.Flew silently and straight across 35 ft yard. with me sitting about 20+ ft away. after crossing yard, kidney shaped bellows came out of bottom section and started to move up and down.To clear sala. ----it was gone. no noise or anything.It had sections of 3x3x2 inches and was 10-12 inches in diameter i was totally mesmerized and it just disappered  i think about it every day. rmr
content.summary: Flew over trees dropped down to 25 ft then crossed yard 35ft. very level  slowly, pure white or light. absolutely no sound. started climing to clear sala, had kidney shaped bellows extend from that moved up and down on lower sectio  before takeoff --gone
content.locationName: Mueang Chiang Rai, Chang Wat Chiang Rai

droite, je vois la ville et les lumiã¨res de la ville de normandin ã  l'horizon. je suis ã  environ 5 km de normandin. c'est un soir ã©toilã© sans couvert nuageux, lorsque j'observe une lumiã¨re qui restã©e stationnaire pendant environ 10-20 secondes. ã€ ce moment j'ai stationnã© mon pickup sur le cã´tã© de la route et j'ai continuã© ã  observer le phã©nomã¨ne qui se dã©roulait devant moi. content.summary: Une lumiã¨re

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend had a night fishing session on lake austin last week (march 3) and we had the strangest experience of our lives from about 2am to 6.30am.  the evening began at about 11.30pm (tues evening) with a beautiful clear sky, we were star spotting, naming constellations etc and generally enjoying a beautiful quiet night.  then at around 1am (wed) we noticed that the sky had completely clouded over and there was no stars visible in the sky and we were surprised by the difference in such a short time.  then around 2am the action began, i first noticed a stationary single bright light in the sky (it was extremely bright, which is why i noticed it) to the north west of us, which for about 2-3 seconds i was trying to establish what it was, when i then pointed it out to my friend, who saw it straight away and we initially thought it was a star.  almost immediately after my friend saw the light, it began moving in a north east direction across the sky relatively slowly.  we then started rationalizing that the light was a plane, it appeared to disappear which we assumed was it going behind the clouds. it then reappeared a second or so later still moving in a north east direction, we were just in the process of discussing that it has to be a plane, when the light abruptly made a 90 degree directional change to the north east in the sky.  then 2 -3 seconds later the light disappeared again.  when the light appeared again, it had moved slightly in the sky, more west than when it originally disappeared. then for the next 4 – 5 hours we witnessed this light pulsating from bright to dim, always appearing in different spots in the sky and it was always in a general north direction in the sky, with it finally being right above us before it completely disappeared. during this time we witnessed the light split into two, move east and west and then come back together.  we also saw the light move quickly in a southerly direction in the sky and then abruptly change again to a northerly direction, like a fishing hook shape. during the night we also witnessed 2 additional lights that appeared to have the same strange characteristics one to the west of us and one to the south.  we were able to determine that the light in the south was constantly appearing in a slightly different location as we were witnessing it through the tops of trees.  the crazy thing to us was when we were witnessing the original light pulsating in and out , i 'out-loud' asked if it could get brighter, at which point it got the brightest we had so far witnessed.  it was almost so bright that it was blinding to the naked eye.  i proceeded to ask the same question over the next hour and when i did, it appeared to respond and get brighter.  while i was doing this i remembered that i had my digital camera with me (for fish pictures) and i proceeded to try to get a photo of it.  i zoomed in to maximum and was trying to get a picture which was difficult due to the light constantly pulsating in and out  and reappearing in a slightly different location.  at 3.05am i took 2 photos, the first one was blank and then the second one showed two dim orbs and one very bright light (triangular in shape) which was strange i we could only see one light in the sky with the naked eye when i took the picture. you do have to zoom into the picture to see properly.  then at 3.08am i took a series of 5 pictures, the first four show the light at different stages of pulsating with the final picture completely blank.  the first photo at 3.08am is the clearest picture of all, if you zoom in, the anomaly looks to me like darth vader's tie fighter with a couple of swirls of light coming off the wings and also appears to have blue/green color aspect near the wings (only appears when zoomed in).   i think i took all these pictures within about 20 to 30 seconds, but it was absolutely within a minute as recorded by the camera.  please remember when viewing the pictures there was thick cloud cover and this was the only light in the sky at the time.  

just as dawn was breaking my friend spotted a clear metallic cylinder/cigar shaped object with a light running along its center to our south.  when it appeared he tried to point it out to me and when i looked up, i couldn't see it as it was moving, he then again tried to point it out and by the time i tried to look, it had disappeared or gone behind clouds.  even though i didn't witness this object, i did witness my friend's reaction to it and i know it was genuine.  he exclaimed that he thought it was a plane, but it had no wings. also during our light anomaly experience we did feel that it was possible that we lost some time, maybe 30 – 60 minutes, but we certainly don't know for sure, as it was only our perception. 

by early morning, when we saw and heard  two planes in the sky we realized, that these were the first planes we had seen or heard all night since 6.30pm tuesday evening (we had a red biplane fly over us).  we thought this was strange, because when i have fished at the same spot in the evening, there are normally numerous planes that can be seen and heard.  it may have been the thick cloud cover, as i said it just seemed strange. 


my friend and i feel we are very open minded, straight down the line kind of guys.  we tried to attempt to come up with a logical explanation, such as a plane, star, atmospheric/weather phenomena etc, which to us, nothing would fit. the experience left us completely blown away!  we especially felt mentally drained from viewing this phenomenon, we did fish all night and left the lake at 11am the next morning.  i could not then sleep till about 2pm that day and then slept for 24 hours, which i have never done before.
content.summary: While fishing overnight with a friend on lake austin texas, we had strange light anomalies occur for roughly 5 hours

content.detailedDescription: The night before this event i had been meditating and attempting to contact e.T. life through ce-5 protocols as i have done in the past. i caught a possible orb the night before but this is a motion activated camera. within 0.3 seconds it shoots off a 3 round burst. the second picture has an object not located in number one and three. i believe i set the camera off myself when i went to get it from the spot i have it mounted in my backyard. pay attention to the time on this camera as it never moves even so much as a second forward. the fourth picture is an edited version of number two so it can bring out the object if you can not spot it beforehand.
content.summary: Motion activated camera caught this apparent ufo
